tool_description: Stay up-to-date with the latest company information as our API delivers real-time data feeds, ensuring that businesses can make timely and informed decisions.
name: Companies API
title: Companies API

api_list.name: Get Request for Companies
api_list.description: Our API provides seamless integration with your customers' existing systems, granting them direct access to real-time, accurate, and reliable data on companies across various industries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-api4.p.rapidapi.com/6q7Pwi/companies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://companies-api4.p.rapidapi.com/6q7Pwi/companies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "companies-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
